# Data.Base64EncodingOptions

**Type Alias**

Options to use when encoding data.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Base64EncodingOptions = NSData.Base64EncodingOptions
```

## Related Documentation

- **NSData.Base64EncodingOptions**: Options for methods used to Base64 encode data.

## Base-64 Encoding

- **base64EncodedData(options:)**: Returns Base-64 encoded data.
- **base64EncodedString(options:)**: Returns a Base-64 encoded string.
- **Data.Base64DecodingOptions**: Options to use when decoding data.
